hero.description: Save time, engage your members, and create quality content through collective intelligence. Snowledge transforms every community interaction into a growth opportunity.

features.description: On Snowledge, ideas come from creators or the community. Needs are automatically detected, the right contributors are mobilized, creation is orchestrated, and revenues are distributed according to each person's contribution.
features.card_1_text: Snowledge analyzes Discord exchanges to identify trends and needs. Members can also submit ideas and vote, helping you prioritize what deserves to be created.
features.card_2_text: Snowledge mobilizes the right contributors at the right time, organizes collaborative work, and facilitates the emergence of quality resources, without you having to manage everything yourself.
features.card_3_text: Contributions are tracked, their impact measured, and revenues automatically shared. No need to manage anything: everyone gets their share, thus strengthening engagement.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: We have compiled the most important information to help you get the most out of your experience.
faq.not_found: Can't find what you're looking for?
faq.item_1_question: Why does Snowledge focus on community co-creation?
faq.item_1_answer: Because the best educational content is not created alone. Snowledge allows creators to involve their community from the idea stage, to validate what deserves to be produced, mobilize the right profiles, and share the value created. It's fairer, more efficient, and more sustainable.
faq.item_2_question: What is the role of artificial intelligence in Snowledge?
faq.item_2_answer: AI analyzes your community's exchanges to extract clear signals: recurring needs, emerging topics, concrete expectations. It helps you detect what to produce, with whom, and for whom without having to read every message or launch manual surveys.
faq.item_3_question: Why integrate blockchain into an educational platform?
faq.item_3_answer: Because recognition, traceability, and fair distribution are essential. Thanks to blockchain, Snowledge automatically records who contributes to what, how, and when, then distributes revenues transparently, without intermediaries.
faq.item_4_question: What is the deeper purpose behind Snowledge?
faq.item_4_answer: We want to help change the 'lone creator' dynamic. Too many talents create alone, hope to sell, and burn out. Snowledge is based on a belief: collective intelligence can produce more useful, fairer, and better-paid content. Our mission is to make this model possible—technically, economically, and humanly.
faq.cta_title: Do our approach and product resonate with you?
faq.cta_description: Contact us to become one of our first ambassadors!

manageIntegrations.missingDescription: The assigned channel for {label} no longer exists on Discord.

manageIntegrations.discordLimitationTooltipBlocked: If you try to rename the same channel a 3rd time in this period, all channel modifications will be blocked for 10 minutes.

manageIntegrations.warningRename: Renaming is taking more than 5 seconds. You have probably reached the Discord limit (2 renames every 10 minutes). Please wait 10 minutes or rename the channel directly on Discord.

manageIntegrations.errorRename: Error while renaming the Discord channel.

step2.title: Step 2
step2.subtitle: Connect your Discord
step2.description: This is the essential step to enable data collection and voting.

features.title: At the heart of your community reactor
features.description: Discover how our tools turn information into action.

passive.title: AI at the service of your intuition
passive.description: Once you have authorized our bot to read certain channels, our system gets to work. All conversations are aggregated and can be sent to our LLM. With one click from your "Trends and Analytics" tab, request a sentiment analysis to know if the mood is positive, a summary of key points from the last 24 hours, or an identification of recurring topics. No more navigating blindly, understand what makes your community tick.

active.title: Give your community a voice
active.description: Active collection is your governance tool. By activating this function, the bot deploys three dedicated channels on your Discord: one for members to submit ideas (#proposals), one to vote (#votes), and one to display the final decisions (#results). All these activities are synchronized on your Snowledge platform in the "Voting" tab, giving you an overview and full control over the decisions that shape your community.

management.title: A simple and secure integration
management.description: When our bot joins your server, it creates a welcome channel. Your Discord members can click a button there to authorize Snowledge, which creates an account for them in a flash and assigns them the "Snowledge Authenticated" role. This role is key: it gives them access to all the special channels you create via the bot, such as voting channels. This way, you keep control over who participates in the decision-making processes.

permissions.title: Pro tip: Bot Permissions
permissions.description: For passive collection to work on private channels, make sure the Snowledge bot has the necessary role and permissions to read messages in those channels.

relevance.title: For relevant analyses
relevance.description: The quality of the AI's analyses depends on the conversations. Choose active channels where discussions are richest to get the best summaries and trends.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.q1_trigger: How do my users sign up for Snowledge?
faq.q1_content: It's very simple. The bot creates a channel on your Discord with an authorization button. By clicking it, the user accepts our terms and a Snowledge account is created for them, linked to their Discord ID.
faq.q2_trigger: What is the 'Snowledge Authenticated' role for?
faq.q2_content: This role is automatically assigned to users who have linked their account. It allows you to give them access to exclusive channels, such as those for proposals and votes, ensuring that only engaged members participate.
faq.q3_trigger: Does the bot read all my messages?
faq.q3_content: No. The bot will only read messages from the channels you have explicitly selected for passive collection in your interface. You have full control over the data you want to analyze.
faq.q4_trigger: Can I use Snowledge without Discord?
faq.q4_content: For now, Discord is our first and main integration, as it is where many communities live. We plan to integrate other platforms like Telegram, YouTube, and WhatsApp in the future.

future.title: Our vision for the future
future.description: Snowledge is just getting started. Here's what's next on the adventure.

contentCreation.title: Content creation assistance
contentCreation.description: We will integrate AI tools to help you transform community trends into drafts of articles, video scripts, or posts, directly from Snowledge.

rewards.title: Contributor reward system
rewards.description: Automatically identify and thank the most active and relevant members of your community. Highlight your ambassadors and encourage positive engagement.
